sqlMap.select: select ID as id, C_NAME as name, C_HOTELID as hotelid, C_ORDERID as orderid, C_PROPERTY as property, C_ROOMTYPENAME as roomtypename, C_ROOMID as roomid, C_COMEDATE as comedate, C_LEAVEDATE as leavedate, C_ORDERPEAPLE as orderpeaple, C_MANYDAY as manyday, C_PRICE as price, C_PREDESC as predesc, C_PRETIME as pretime, C_MEMBERNAME as membername, C_MEMBERMOBILE as membermobile, C_MEMBERID as memberid, C_VERSION as version, C_CANCLEREASON as canclereason, C_STATE as state, C_YESTATE as yestate, C_LINKNAME as linkname, C_LINKMOBILE as linkmobile, C_LINKMAIL as linkmail, C_LINKTELL as linktell, C_CONFIRMMETHOD as confirmmethod, C_RESERVSTART as reservstart, C_RESERVEND as reservend, C_SPECREQ as specreq, C_PREROOMS as prerooms, C_CHECKDESC as checkdesc, C_FAXSENDTIME as faxsendtime, C_CODE as code, C_RESULTVALUE as resultvalue, C_RESULTCODE as resultcode, C_SYSTEMUSERID as systemuserid, C_TYPE as type, C_PAYTYPE as paytype, C_CHECKTYPE as checktype, C_DAYPRICE as dayprice, C_ISHOTELPAY as ishotelpay, C_PAYSTATE as paystate, C_PAYMENT as payment, C_ACTUALMOUNT as actualmount, C_COUPONAMOUNT as couponamount, C_NUMBER as number, C_SEX as sex, C_WAICODE as waicode, C_DANBAO as danbao, C_BAOLIUTIME as baoliutime, C_SHIJITIME as shijitime, C_FANPRICE as fanprice, C_YUFUPRICE as yufuprice, C_XIANFUPRICE as xianfuprice, C_PROFITS as profits, C_CREATEUSERID as createuserid, C_PRICECODEID as pricecodeid, C_PRICECODENAME as pricecodename, C_PRICECURRENCY as pricecurrency, C_ORDERSOURCE as ordersource from T_HOTELORDER where ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into T_HOTELORDER ( ID, C_NAME, C_HOTELID, C_ORDERID, C_PROPERTY, C_ROOMTYPENAME, C_ROOMID, C_COMEDATE, C_LEAVEDATE, C_ORDERPEAPLE, C_MANYDAY, C_PRICE, C_PREDESC, C_PRETIME, C_MEMBERNAME, C_MEMBERMOBILE, C_MEMBERID, C_VERSION, C_CANCLEREASON, C_STATE, C_YESTATE, C_LINKNAME, C_LINKMOBILE, C_LINKMAIL, C_LINKTELL, C_CONFIRMMETHOD, C_RESERVSTART, C_RESERVEND, C_SPECREQ, C_PREROOMS, C_CHECKDESC, C_FAXSENDTIME, C_CODE, C_RESULTVALUE, C_RESULTCODE, C_SYSTEMUSERID, C_TYPE, C_PAYTYPE, C_CHECKTYPE, C_DAYPRICE, C_ISHOTELPAY, C_PAYSTATE, C_PAYMENT, C_ACTUALMOUNT, C_COUPONAMOUNT, C_NUMBER, C_SEX, C_WAICODE, C_DANBAO, C_BAOLIUTIME, C_SHIJITIME, C_FANPRICE, C_YUFUPRICE, C_XIANFUPRICE, C_PROFITS, C_CREATEUSERID, C_PRICECODEID, C_PRICECODENAME, C_PRICECURRENCY, C_ORDERSOURCE ) values (

sqlMap.update:
update T_HOTELORDER set C_NAME = #name#, C_HOTELID = #hotelid:DECIMAL#, C_ORDERID = #orderid#, C_PROPERTY = #property#, C_ROOMTYPENAME = #roomtypename#, C_ROOMID = #roomid:DECIMAL#, C_COMEDATE = #comedate#, C_LEAVEDATE = #leavedate#, C_ORDERPEAPLE = #orderpeaple:DECIMAL#, C_MANYDAY = #manyday:DECIMAL#, C_PRICE = #price#, C_PREDESC = #predesc#, C_PRETIME = #pretime#, C_MEMBERNAME = #membername#, C_MEMBERMOBILE = #membermobile#, C_MEMBERID = #memberid:DECIMAL#, C_VERSION = #version:DECIMAL#, C_CANCLEREASON = #canclereason:DECIMAL#, C_STATE = #state:DECIMAL#, C_YESTATE = #yestate:DECIMAL#, C_LINKNAME = #linkname#, C_LINKMOBILE = #linkmobile#, C_LINKMAIL = #linkmail#, C_LINKTELL = #linktell#, C_CONFIRMMETHOD = #confirmmethod:DECIMAL#, C_RESERVSTART = #reservstart#, C_RESERVEND = #reservend#, C_SPECREQ = #specreq#, C_PREROOMS = #prerooms:DECIMAL#, C_CHECKDESC = #checkdesc#, C_FAXSENDTIME = #faxsendtime#, C_CODE = #code#, C_RESULTVALUE = #resultvalue#, C_RESULTCODE = #resultcode:DECIMAL#, C_SYSTEMUSERID = #systemuserid:DECIMAL#, C_TYPE = #type:DECIMAL#, C_PAYTYPE = #paytype:DECIMAL#, C_CHECKTYPE = #checktype:DECIMAL#, C_DAYPRICE = #dayprice#, C_ISHOTELPAY = #ishotelpay:DECIMAL#, C_PAYSTATE = #paystate:DECIMAL#, C_PAYMENT = #payment:DECIMAL#, C_ACTUALMOUNT = #actualmount:DECIMAL#, C_COUPONAMOUNT = #couponamount:DECIMAL#, C_NUMBER = #number:DECIMAL#, C_SEX = #sex:DECIMAL#, C_WAICODE = #waicode:DECIMAL#, C_DANBAO = #danbao:DECIMAL#, C_SHIJITIME = #shijitime:DECIMAL#, C_BAOLIUTIME = #baoliutime:DECIMAL#, C_FANPRICE = #fanprice:DECIMAL#, C_YUFUPRICE = #yufuprice:DECIMAL#, C_XIANFUPRICE = #xianfuprice:DECIMAL#, C_PROFITS = #profits:DECIMAL#, C_CREATEUSERID = #createuserid:DECIMAL#, C_PRICECODEID = #pricecodeid:DECIMAL#, C_PRICECODENAME = #pricecodename:DECIMAL#, C_PRICECURRENCY = #pricecurrency:DECIMAL#, C_ORDERSOURCE = #ordersource:DECIMAL#
